name: freeze-shock
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
flavor_text: The turn after using this move, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
